thread.title: Brian R. Leve, LLB, CPA, Honored for Excellence in Tax Consultation
thread.title_full: Brian R. Leve, LLB, CPA, Honored for Excellence in Tax Consultation

title: Brian R. Leve, LLB, CPA, Honored for Excellence in Tax Consultation
text: Brian R. Leve, LLB, CPA, Honored for Excellence in Tax Consultation Mr. Leve ensures that all aspects of claims are filed correctly Looking back, Mr. Leve attributes his success to his ability to build relationships that engage with clients. THORNHILL, ON, July 03,   Brian R. Leve, LLB, CPA, Owner of NextLevel SR&ED, has been recognized for showing dedication, leadership and excellence in tax consultation. Mr. Leve has 30 years of professional experience, with 10 years as the owner of NextLevel SR&ED. Throughout his career, he has set himself apart as an expert on scientific research and experimental development (SR&ED) planning and filing, and tax consultation. As a tax consultant, he assists clients who use innovative ideas and processes to achieve their business goals and ensures that all aspects of the claims filed, including financial, technical and corporate tax, are handled properly and correctly. Looking back, Mr. Leve attributes his success to his ability to build relationships that engage with clients. He also credits his commitment to providing exceptional client services. He became involved in his profession because, as a young man, he always had an interested in finance and accounting. Mr. Leve received a Bachelor of Laws in tax law and taxation from The University of Western Ontario in 1979, an MBA in finance and financial management services from McGill University in 1976, and a Bachelor of Science, with Honours in Zoology from McGill University in 1972. In five years, Mr. Leve hopes to achieve sustainable growth for the company. Contact Brian at:
